Uses of Interface
events.IAEvent

  • Packages that use IAEvent 
    Package Description
    events
    Provides the classes necessary for the event system.
    events.gameview
    Provides all gameView events classes.
    events.gameview.gameState  
    events.gameview.global  
    events.gameview.startState  
    events.logic
    Provides all logic events classes.
    events.logic.endState  
    events.logic.gameState  
    events.logic.global  
    events.logic.startState  
    gameview
    Provides the classes necessary for the game view.
    gameview.eView
    Provides the classes necessary for the end state: End screen.
    gameview.gView
    Provides the classes necessary for the game state: Main window with map, figures, ...
    gameview.kIView  
    gameview.sView
    Provides the classes necessary for the start state: Main menu, start new game, player configuration.
    logic
    Provides the classes necessary for the game logic.
    logic.figure  
    logic.player

    • Uses of IAEvent in events.gameview.global

      Classes in events.gameview.global that implement IAEvent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EEndGame
      Event to end the game.
      class  ENewGame
      GameView Event to initialize a new game.
      class  EPossibleThief
      Delivers the toggle of the check box in the gameModePanel which activates or deactivates the pos. thief position function.
      class  ERequestClose
      Send if there is a close of the window is requested.
      class  ERequestedLanguageSwitch
      Send if language switch is requested.
      class  EStartGame
      Event to start game.
      class  ESwitchGameState
      Send if a game state change is requested.

    • Uses of IAEvent in events.gameview.startState

      Classes in events.gameview.startState that implement IAEvent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EPlayerChosePlayerCount
      send if the player choose the player count this is necessary to create the right number of player panels.
      class  EPlayerRequestedMapData
      Send if the map is chosen.
      class  EPlayerSetProperties
      This event delivers the SPlayer objects to the ActorCcontroler.
      class  EPlayerSwitchedToNewGameView
      If the game configuration is ready and all information is send the state will be changed when this event is processed.

    • Uses of IAEvent in gameview.gView

      Methods in gameview.gView with parameters of type IAEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GState.processEvent(IAEvent e)
      This method processes incoming events and changes gameData by calling the needed functions
      private void GState.processFigureKilled(IAEvent e)
      Helper method for processEvent, this method processes a figure killed event (removal from figurelist, figurequeue, and the status cache, then updating the game elements)
      private void GState.processLogicGameState(IAEvent e)
      Helper method for event processing, this method processes all game relevant events
      private void GState.processLogicGlobal(IAEvent e)
      Helper method for event processing, this method processes all global relevant events (such as language switch)
      private void GState.processNextFigureData(IAEvent e)
      Helper method for processEvent, this method processes a next figure event (choosing new position, figureid, thievetoshow, thievelog)
      private void GState.processNextFigureUpdate(IAEvent e)
      Helper method for processEvent, this method uses the changed next figure data and updates the GUI elements
      private void GState.processNextRound(IAEvent e)
      Helper method for processEvent, this method proccesses a next round event (status update)

      only processes the language event.
